verses.verse: Then came<WH935> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> even<WH6153> the whole<WH3605> congregation,<WH5712> into the desert<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790> in the first<WH7223> month:<WH2320> and the people<WH5971> stayed<WH3427> in Kadesh;<WH6946> and Miriam<WH4813> died<WH4191> there,<WH8033> and was buried<WH6912> there.<WH8033>
And there was no<WH3808> water<WH4325> for the congregation:<WH5712> and they gathered<WH6950> themselves together against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and against<WH5921> Aaron.<WH175>

And the people<WH5971> strived<WH7378> with Moses,<WH4872> and spoke,<WH559> saying,<WH559> Would<WH3863> God that we had died<WH1478> when our brothers<WH251> died<WH1478> before<WH6440> the LORD!<WH3068>
And why<WH4100> have you brought<WH935> up the congregation<WH6951> of the LORD<WH3068> into<WH413> this<WH2088> wilderness,<WH4057> that we and our cattle<WH1165> should die<WH4191> there?<WH8033>

And why<WH4100> have you made us to come<WH5927> up out of Egypt,<WH4714> to bring<WH935> us in to this<WH2088> evil<WH7451> place?<WH4725> it is no<WH3808> place<WH4725> of seed,<WH2233> or of figs,<WH8384> or of vines,<WH1612> or of pomegranates;<WH7416> neither<WH369> is there any water<WH4325> to drink.<WH8354>

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went<WH935> from the presence<WH6440> of the assembly<WH6951> to the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and they fell<WH5307> on their faces:<WH6440> and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to them.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Take<WH3947> the rod,<WH4294> and gather<WH6950> you the assembly<WH5712> together, you, and Aaron<WH175> your brother,<WH251> and speak<WH1696> you to the rock<WH5553> before their eyes;<WH5869> and it shall give<WH5414> forth his water,<WH4325> and you shall bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to them water<WH4325> out of the rock:<WH5553> so you shall give the congregation<WH5712> and their beasts<WH1165> drink.<WH8248>
And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the rod<WH4294> from before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> as he commanded<WH6680> him.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> gathered<WH6950> the congregation<WH6951> together before<WH413> <WH6440> the rock,<WH5553> and he said<WH559> to them, Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> you rebels;<WH4784> must we fetch<WH3318> you water<WH4325> out of this<WH2088> rock?<WH5553>

And Moses<WH4872> lifted<WH7311> up his hand,<WH3027> and with his rod<WH4294> he smote<WH5221> the rock<WH5553> twice:<WH6471> and the water<WH4325> came<WH3318> out abundantly,<WH7227> and the congregation<WH5712> drank, and their beasts<WH1165> also.

And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> Because<WH3282> you believed<WH539> me not, to sanctify<WH6942> me in the eyes<WH5869> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> therefore<WH3651> you shall not bring<WH935> this<WH2088> congregation<WH6951> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I have given<WH5414> them.
This<WH1992> is the water<WH4325> of Meribah;<WH4809> because<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> strove<WH7378> with the LORD,<WH3068> and he was sanctified<WH6942> in them.

And Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> from Kadesh<WH6946> to the king<WH4428> of Edom,<WH123> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> your brother<WH251> Israel,<WH3478> You know<WH3045> all<WH3605> the travail<WH8513> that has befallen<WH4672> us:

How our fathers<WH1> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> into Egypt,<WH4714> and we have dwelled<WH3427> in Egypt<WH4714> a long<WH7227> time;<WH3117> and the Egyptians<WH4714> vexed<WH7489> us, and our fathers:<WH1>

And when we cried<WH6817> to the LORD,<WH3068> he heard<WH8085> our voice,<WH6963> and sent<WH7971> an angel,<WH4397> and has brought<WH3318> us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt:<WH4714> and, behold,<WH2009> we are in Kadesh,<WH6946> a city<WH5892> in the uttermost<WH7097> of your border:<WH1366>

Let us pass,<WH5674> I pray<WH4994> you, through your country:<WH776> we will not pass<WH5674> through the fields,<WH7704> or through the vineyards,<WH3754> neither<WH3808> will we drink<WH8354> of the water<WH4325> of the wells:<WH875> we will go<WH3212> by the king's<WH4428> high way,<WH1870> we will not turn<WH5186> to the right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> nor to the left,<WH8040> until<WH5704> we have passed<WH5674> your borders.<WH1366>
And Edom<WH123> said<WH559> to him, You shall not pass<WH5674> by me, lest I come<WH3318> out against<WH7125> you with the sword.<WH2719>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to him, We will go<WH5927> by the high<WH4546> way: and if<WH518> I and my cattle<WH4735> drink<WH8354> of your water,<WH4325> then I will pay<WH5414> <WH4377> for it: I will only,<WH7535> without<WH369> doing anything<WH1697> else, go<WH5674> through<WH5674> on<WH5921> my feet.<WH7272>
And he said,<WH559> You shall not go<WH5674> through.<WH5674> And Edom<WH123> came<WH3318> out against<WH7125> him with much<WH3515> people,<WH5971> and with a strong<WH2389> hand.<WH3027>
Thus Edom<WH123> refused<WH3985> to give<WH5414> Israel<WH3478> passage<WH5674> through his border:<WH1366> why Israel<WH3478> turned<WH5186> away from him.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> even the whole<WH3605> congregation,<WH5712> journeyed<WH5265> from Kadesh,<WH6946> and came<WH935> to mount<WH2022> Hor.<WH2023>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> in mount<WH2022> Hor,<WH2023> by the coast<WH1366> of the land<WH776> of Edom,<WH123> saying,<WH559>

Aaron<WH175> shall be gathered<WH622> to his people:<WH5971> for he shall not enter<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I have given<WH5414> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> because<WH5921> <WH834> you rebelled<WH4784> against<WH4775> my word<WH6310> at the water<WH4325> of Meribah.<WH4809>
Take<WH3947> Aaron<WH175> and Eleazar<WH499> his son,<WH1121> and bring<WH5927> them up to mount<WH2022> Hor:<WH2023>

And strip<WH6584> Aaron<WH175> of his garments,<WH899> and put<WH3847> them on Eleazar<WH499> his son:<WH1121> and Aaron<WH175> shall be gathered<WH622> to his people,<WH5971> and shall die<WH4191> there.<WH8033>
And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded:<WH6680> and they went<WH5927> up into<WH413> mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the congregation.<WH5712>

And Moses<WH4872> stripped<WH6584> Aaron<WH175> of his garments,<WH899> and put<WH3847> them on Eleazar<WH499> his son;<WH1121> and Aaron<WH175> died<WH4191> there<WH8033> in the top<WH7218> of the mount:<WH2022> and Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> came<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the mount.<WH2022>

And when all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> saw<WH7200> that Aaron<WH175> was dead,<WH1478> they mourned<WH1058> for Aaron<WH175> thirty<WH7970> days,<WH3117> even all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>
